programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to a first-class auction in Arcadia, but when bids quickly start reaching into the thousands, Mary is left struggling to keep up.

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Ton Jones believes he has found whiskey in a gallon flagon, that was smuggled by Al Capone in the 1920s - but cannot decide whether to sell the alcohol or consume it.

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Ton Jones and Allen Haff head to California, where they acquire a 1940s arcade game, a Winchester shotgun and an antique crossbow.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: New store owner Lesa gets started on running the business, while Ricky and Bubba examine a vintage air compressor and Moe discovers some stunning lithographs.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The bidders face tough competition when they find themselves up against 100 rivals at an auction in Longview.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Rick challenges a potential new recruit to prove his worth by restoring a scooter.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: A collector of rare memorabilia asks for a job and the team work on restoring a sign from a 1940s petrol station.

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: RJ and Paul invoke the powers of their ancestors before setting out to kill a crocodile named Bigfoot, while Troy makes a discovery that leaves him in a dangerous position.

programme.title: Ernie the Wildman
programme.desc: Turtleman investigates a mysterious predator, and discovers that armadillo burrows are destroying the foundations of someone's home.

programme.title: Ernie the Wildman
programme.desc: Turtleman tries to track down some turkeys that are nesting inside a corn maze and frightening the children that come to visit.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The pawnbrokers deal with the most expensive item they have ever appraised, while Rick assesses a 1948 electric shock therapy machine and an off-road vehicle.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Corey and Chum are offered 50 pieces of plastic Americana, and an inscription on a coaching gun provides a puzzle for the pawnbrokers.

programme.title: Meet the Richardsons
programme.desc: Comedy series starring real-life married couple Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont as they offer a fictional view of their life together. Jon is given career advice from his comedy hero, Jack Dee. Meanwhile, Lucy signs Jon up to be the celebrity judge at the World Dock Pudding Competition in Hebden Bridge.

credits.actor: Lucy Beaumont as they offer a fictional view of their life together

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Jessica Knappett's sunny outlook on life is severely tested by a former traffic warden, and Rhod Gilbert once again endangers Alex's life.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Pointless co-host Alexander Armstrong takes over the reins for extended edition of the satirical quiz, with comedian Roisin Conaty and broadcaster James O'Brien joining team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the stories making the headlines.

programme.title: Jon Richardson: Ultimate Worrier
programme.desc: Jon's wife and fellow comedian Lucy Beaumont is on hand to answer her stressed spouse's worries about himself - and their marriage. Jonathan Ross also guests.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: Brian has found the magical amulet that can potentially send him home - but it doesn't work. Howell tricks him into getting a book from the oddly menacing Munty Library.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Gendle and Tim are dropped into a downhill bike park and create a human marble run using motorbikes and riders wearing zorbs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Impossible Railways
programme.desc: A look at the planet's most incredible metropolitan railways, and how they help people solve distinctly urban problems. Including a project to upgrade New York's transit system..

programme.title: Underground Worlds
programme.desc: A look at the sinister history of Edinburgh's vaults and the development of Helsinki's subterranean spaces. Plus, the impact of the building of Naples on the volcanic ground below.

programme.title: Nazi Victory: The Post-War Plan
programme.desc: How Hitler used recreation to promote his ideology, setting up the world's largest beach resort and travel agency and attempting to turn the Olympics into a propaganda tool.

programme.title: Secrets of the Bible
programme.sub-title: Tudor Parfitt & The Lost Tribes of Israel
programme.desc: The claims of British historian, writer, broadcaster and adventurer Professor Tudor Parfitt, who says he located an African tribe of Jews called the Lemba whose roots can be traced back to the Jews of the Old Testament.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Waking the Dead
programme.desc: Feature-length episode of the police drama in which Boyd and the team investigate the murder of a Home Office adviser. All fingers seem to point to the institution's private secretary, who reluctantly admits to having met with the dead woman on the night she was killed. Finally, Frankie finds forensic evidence that promises to clear up any doubt. Starring Trevor Eve.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Gina continues to keep the news of her cancer a closely guarded secret, little suspecting Amber has put two and two together after spotting her at the hospital. Gabriel rescues schoolgirl Gemma Bentley from the clutches of her wicked stepmother and is rewarded with a passionate kiss from Sheelagh, while Steve confronts Scott about the investigation into his wife's murder - and is given an ominous warning.

programme.title: London's Burning
programme.desc: The crew are called in to deal with a huge explosion in a nightclub. Meanwhile, the private eye tells Bayleaf that he has found his daughter Melanie.

programme.title: McDonald & Dodds
programme.sub-title: The Fall of the House of Crockett
programme.desc: Mystery drama set in Bath, where the wildly ambitious DCI McDonald finds herself paired with the shy, modest DS Dodds, who has languished on the shelf for most of his working life. However, it soon turns out the unassuming sergeant has a hidden talent for puzzle solving. Their first case sees the pair looking into the shooting of a homeless man in the deserted mansion of local industrialist Max Crockett. The Crockett appear to be a close-knit group but it soon becomes clear they have secrets to hide. Jason Watkins and Tala Gouveia star as the detectives, with a guest appearance from Robert Lindsay.

programme.title: The People's History Show
programme.desc: Sarah Mack and Angus Simpson find out about one of the worst storms to hit Scotland, celebrate the QE2, and learn about Nan Shepherd, who appears on the Scottish Â£5 note, and Celtic's barefoot Indian footballer Mohammed Salim.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Rewind The Party Classics
programme.desc: We're all about good times and good tunes! Get in the party mood as we rewind the ultimate party tunes to get you on the dancefloor.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: Hit After Hit
programme.desc: Nothing but the biggest hits by your favourite stars back to back.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How giant floating power stations and the world's smallest aircraft are created.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer combines his love of vintage Escorts and rallying by making a Ford rally car, and it is left to Edd China to try to make a profit on such an expensive build.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: Husband and wife Nick and Jo risk one last supply to a remote settlement as the wet season looms. Meanwhile, Craig and his son deliver hay to drought-hit stations.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Paul Jr gets into trouble when he jumps the gun on fabrication and his father's manners are put under the spotlight.

programme.title: Fantomworks
programme.desc: Rich and Kathy need to save their 1951 Buick Super, and hope FantomWorks can help. Jim's classic 1961 Corvette has a strange ailment - and Dan must solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe travels to Arizona and tries his hand at moving a giant cactus. He then he heads to Idaho to work with millions of maggots.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: How nail clippers, jade putters, ice cider and water skis are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: A look at how stagecoaches, road reflectors and custom motorcycle tanks are made and how manufacturing processes have developed over the years.
